info.description: This API provides access to data on the Flux platform.
info.title: Flux API

tags.name: Service
tags.description: Health check and basic service operations, such as the ping endpoint.

tags.name: Organization
tags.description: Operations related to user management, roles, and permissions within organizations.

tags.name: Products
tags.description: Operations related to managing products, categories, and specifications.

tags.name: Currency
tags.description: Operations for handling currencies, conversions, and related financial data.

tags.name: Entity
tags.description: Operations concerning entities such as producers, carriers, marketers, and other stakeholders.

tags.name: Lines
tags.description: Operations related to infrastructure lines, including pipelines and rail lines.

tags.name: Facilities
tags.description: Operations managing facilities such as terminals, plants, batteries, and stations.

tags.name: Volumes
tags.description: Operations for managing volumes, including tickets, meters, and volume transactions.

Unauthorized.description: Unauthorized. The API key is missing or invalid.

Forbidden.description: Forbidden. The user does not have the necessary permissions.

InternalServerError.description: Something went wrong on the server.

BadRequest.description: The request was malformed or contained invalid parameters.

error.example: Invalid parameter format: page must be a positive integer.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of facility types.
get.description: Retrieve a list of facility types with pagination and filtering options.

200.description: A paginated list of facility types.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of facility subtypes.
get.description: Retrieve a list of facility subtypes with pagination and filtering options.

200.description: A paginated list of facility subtypes.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of terminals.
get.description: Retrieve a list of terminals with pagination and filtering options.

get.summary: Retrieve a single terminal by ID.
get.description: Retrieve details of a specific terminal, including its name, type, subtype, status and associated entity.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of plants.
get.description: Retrieve a list of plants.

get.summary: Retrieve a single plant by ID.
get.description: Retrieve a single plant by ID.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of batteries.
get.description: Retrieve a list of batteries.

get.summary: Retrieve a single battery by ID.
get.description: Retrieve a single battery by ID.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of stations.
get.description: Retrieve a list of stations.

get.summary: Retrieve a single station by ID.
get.description: Retrieve a single station by ID.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of systems.
get.description: Retrieve a list of systems.

get.summary: Retrieve a single system by ID.
get.description: Retrieve a single system by ID.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of pipelines.
get.description: Retrieve a list of pipelines with pagination and filtering options.

get.summary: Retrieve a single pipeline by ID.
get.description: Retrieve a single pipeline by ID.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of rail lines.
get.description: Retrieve a list of rail lines with pagination and filtering options.

200.description: A paginated list of rail lines.

get.summary: Retrieve a single rail line.
get.description: Retrieve a single rail line with pagination and filtering options.

get.summary: Retrieve the current organization.
get.description: Retrieve details about the current organization including associated entities, wells, and facilities.

200.description: A single organization object containing organization details along with related entities, wells, terminals, plants, batteries, stations, systems and pipelines.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of users.
get.description: Retrieve a list of users with pagination and filtering options.

get.summary: Retrieve a single user by ID.
get.description: Retrieve details about a specific user including their roles and permissions.

200.description: A single user object containing user details along with related roles and permissions.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of user roles.
get.description: Retrieve a list of user roles.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of user permissions.
get.description: Retrieve a list of user permissions.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of entities.
get.description: Retrieve a list of entities with pagination and filtering options.

get.summary: Retrieve a single entity by ID.
get.description: Retrieve details about a specific entity including associated producer, carrier, marketer and other entity types.

200.description: A single entity object containing entity details along with related entity type information.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of currencies.
get.description: Retrieve a list of currencies.

get.summary: Retrieve the live exchange rate.
get.description: Retrieve the live exchange rate.

parameters.name: from_currency
parameters.description: The symbol of the currency to convert from.

parameters.name: to_currency
parameters.description: The symbol of the currency to convert to.

200.description: The exchange rate between the two currencies.

error.example: You must include from_currency and to_currency as query params.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of product category specifications.
get.description: Retrieve a list of product category specifications.

200.description: A list of product category specifications.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of product categories.
get.description: Retrieve a list of product categories.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of products.
get.description: Retrieve a list of products.

get.summary: Retrieve a single product by ID.
get.description: Retrieve a single product by ID.

get.summary: Check the server health.
get.description: Check the server health.

get.description: Retrieve details about a specific well including associated entity information.

200.description: A single well object containing well details along with related entity information.
